wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas Sharratt (born in Nottingham) is an English operatic tenor.

response: As discussed below, Joseph Papp's 1980–83 Pirates ran for nearly two years each on Broadway and in the West End, boosting the opera's popularity. Professional and amateur productions of the opera continue with frequency. For example, the Chicago Lyric Opera and English National Opera each staged the work in 2004,Hall, George.
